card.name: ·The One Ring, Answer To All Riddles
card.text: While wearing The One Ring, the Ring-bearer is strength +2, and each time he is about to take a wound in a skirmish, add a burden instead. Skirmish: Add a burden to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·The One Ring, The Ruling Ring
card.text: Response: If bearer is about to take a wound in a skirmish, he wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound during a skirmish, add a burden instead.

card.name: Anger
card.text: Skirmish: Spot 3 {Dunland} minions or a site you control to make a {Dunland} Man fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Band of Wild Men
card.text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may make it fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Burn Every Village
card.text: Skirmish: Make a {Dunland} Man strength +2 (or +4 if you control a site).

card.name: Constantly Threatening
card.text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: If the fellowship has moved more than once this turn, remove {2} to play a {Dunland} Man from your discard pile.

card.name: Dark Fury
card.text: Skirmish: Make a {Dunland} Man strength +2 (or +4 if at a sanctuary).

card.name: Death to the Strawheads
card.text: Skirmish: Make a {Dunland} Man strength +1 for each companion you spot.

card.name: Dunlending Arsonist
card.text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may play a {Dunland} Man from hand; his twilight cost is -2. That Man is fierce and damage +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Dunlending Looter
card.text: When this minion wins a skirmish, you may stack him on a site you control. Shadow: If stacked on a site you control, play this minion. His twilight cost is -2.

card.name: Dunlending Madman
card.text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may make him strength +2 and fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Dunlending Pillager
card.text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may discard a Free Peoples possession (or 2 possessions if you spot 6 companions).

card.name: Dunlending Ransacker
card.text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may spot another {Dunland} Man to take control of a site.

card.name: Dunlending Ravager
card.text: While skirmishing a {Rohan} Man, this minion is strength +2. Assignment: Spot an ally to make that ally participate in skirmishes and assign this minion to skirmish that ally.

card.name: Dunlending Robber
card.text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may make him strength +2 and fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Dunlending Warrior
card.text: Assignment: Spot an ally to make that ally participate in skirmishes and assign this minion to skirmish that ally.

card.name: Hides
card.text: Plays to your support area. When you play this possession, you may draw a card. Response: If a {Dunland} Man is about to take a wound, remove {2} or discard this possession to prevent that wound.

card.name: ·Hill Chief
card.text: Shadow: Spot a site you control and exert Hill Chief to draw 3 cards.

card.name: Hillman Band
card.text: Each time the fellowship moves, you may spot another {Dunland} Man to take control of a site.

card.name: ·Hillman Horde
card.text: While you control 2 sites, skip the archery phase. While you control 3 sites, each of your {Dunland} Men is fierce. While you control 4 sites, each of your {Dunland} Men is damage +1.

card.name: Hillman Mob
card.text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may play a {Dunland} Man from hand; his twilight cost is -2. That Man is fierce and damage +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Hillman Rabble
card.text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may stack it on a site you control. Shadow: If stacked on a site you control, play this minion. Its twilight cost is -2.

card.name: Hillman Tribe
card.text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may spot another {Dunland} minion to take control of a site.

card.name: Iron Axe
card.text: Bearer must be a {Dunland} Man.

card.name: Living Off Rock
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time a {Dunland} Man wins a skirmish involving a {Rohan} Man, you may make that minion strength +2 and fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: No Defense
card.text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Remove {3} to place a {Dunland} token here. Skirmish: Spot a {Dunland} Man and remove a {Dunland} token from this card. A character skirmishing that {Dunland} Man does not gain strength bonuses from possessions.

card.name: ·No Refuge
card.text: Plays to your support area. While a {Dunland} Man is stacked on a site, the Shadow number of each site is +5.

card.name: No Retreat
card.text: Plays on a site you control. Regroup: Spot 2 {Dunland} Men and discard this condition to make the Free Peoples player choose to move again this turn (if the move limit allows).

card.name: ·Over the Isen
card.text: Plays to your support area. Assignment: Spot a site you control and remove {2} to assign a {Dunland} Man to an unbound companion.

card.name: Ravage the Defeated
card.text: Response: If your {Dunland} Man wins a skirmish, discard all Free Peoples cards borne by the companion or ally he was skirmishing.

card.name: ·Saruman, Rabble-rouser
card.text: Saruman may not be assigned to a skirmish. Each time the fellowship moves, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion for each {Dunland} Man you can spot. Skirmish: Exert Saruman to make a {Dunland} Man strength +2.

card.name: ·Secret Folk
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time a companion or ally loses a skirmish involving a {Dunland} Man, you may place a {Dunland} token on this card. Maneuver: Discard a Free Peoples possession for each {Dunland} token here (limit 3). Discard this condition.

card.name: Wake of Destruction
card.text: Maneuver: Spot 2 sites you control to make each of your {Dunland} Men fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: War Club
card.text: Bearer must be a {Dunland} Man. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may discard 2 Free Peoples possessions.

card.name: War Cry of Dunland
card.text: Response: If a {Dunland} Man wins a skirmish, make him fierce and strength +4 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Wild Man of Dunland
card.text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may play a {Dunland} Man from hand; his twilight cost is -2. That Man is fierce and damage +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Wild Man Raid
card.text: Maneuver: Spot 3 {Dunland} Men to discard a Free Peoples possession or condition.

card.name: ·Wulf, Dunlending Chieftain
card.text: Fierce. Response: If another {Dunland} Man wins a skirmish, exert Wulf to take control of a site.

card.name: ·Axe of Erebor
card.text: Bearer must be Gimli. He is damage +1. Skirmish: Discard a {Dwarven} condition or a card stacked on a {Dwarven} condition to make Gimli strength +1.

card.name: Best Company
card.text: Skirmish: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or +4 if at a battleground).

card.name: Come Here Lad
card.text: Fellowship: Stack the top 2 cards from your draw deck on a {Dwarven} condition that has a card already stacked on it.

card.name: ·Courtesy of My Hall
card.text: Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, stack a card from your discard pile here. Fellowship: Discard a Free Peoples card stacked here to heal a Dwarf.

card.name: Dwarven Foresight
card.text: Fellowship: Spot a Dwarf to take a Free Peoples card stacked on a {Dwarven} condition into hand.

card.name: ·Ever My Heart Rises
card.text: Tale. Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, reveal the top 6 cards of your draw deck and stack them here. Fellowship: Spot a Dwarf and discard the top card of your draw deck to take a Free Peoples card stacked here into

card.name: From the Armory
card.text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert a Dwarf and stack a Free Peoples card from hand here to prevent all wounds to that Dwarf.

card.name: ·Gimli, Lockbearer
card.text: Damage +1. Gimli is strength +1 for each unbound Hobbit companion you can spot.

card.name: ·Gimli, Unbidden Guest
card.text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Exert Gimli to make an unbound companion strength +1 (or +2 if that companion is Legolas).

card.name: ·Here Is Good Rock
card.text: Tale. Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Stack a Free Peoples card from hand here to make a Dwarf damage +1.

card.name: Khazâd Ai-mênu
card.text: Skirmish: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or strength +3 and damage +1 if you spot Legolas).

card.name: ·My Axe Is Notched
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, place a {Dwarven} token on this card. While you can spot X {Dwarven} tokens on this card and the same number of {Elven} tokens on Final Count, Gimli is strength +X (limit +3).

card.name: Quick As May Be
card.text: Maneuver: Spot a Dwarf companion and an Elf companion to wound a minion.

card.name: Rest by Blind Night
card.text: Regroup: Shuffle any number of {Dwarven} conditions (and all cards stacked on them) into your draw deck.

card.name: Restless Axe
card.text: Regroup: Exert a Dwarf to shuffle a {Dwarven} condition (and all cards stacked on it) into your draw deck. Exert a minion for each card shuffled into your draw deck.

card.name: Search Far and Wide
card.text: Fellowship: Spot a Dwarf and discard the top card of your draw deck to draw 2 cards.

card.name: ·Stout and Strong
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time a Dwarf wins a skirmish, you may place a {Dwarven} token on this card. Skirmish: Make an unbound companion strength +1 for each {Dwarven} token here (limit +3). Discard this condition.

card.name: Alliance Reforged
card.text: Tale. Fellowship: Draw a card for each Elf companion you spot.

card.name: Arrow and Blade
card.text: Skirmish: Exert X Elf companions to make a minion skirmishing an unbound companion strength -X.

card.name: Blades Drawn
card.text: To play, spot 3 Elves. Plays to your support area. For each wound on each minion, that minion is strength -2. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.

card.name: Company of Archers
card.text: Archery: Spot 2 Elf companions to discard a condition.

card.name: Elven Bow
card.text: Bearer must be an Elf. Bearer is an archer.

card.name: Elven Brooch
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. Bearer must be a companion. Response: If another possession borne by bearer is about to be discarded by a Shadow card, discard this possession instead.

card.name: Elven Sword
card.text: Bearer must be an Elf. Skirmish: Exert bearer or discard 2 cards from hand to make a minion skirmishing bearer strength -1.

card.name: ·Erethón, Naith Lieutenant
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. While Erethon bears a ranged weapon, he is strength +1 and damage +1, and he does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.name: Feathered
card.text: Skirmish: Make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -2 for each wound on that minion.

card.name: ·Fereveldir, Son of Thandronen
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. Skirmish: Exert Fereveldir and discard an {Elven} token from your condition to wound a minion Fereveldir is skirmishing.

card.name: ·Ferevellon, Son of Thandronen
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. Skirmish: Exert Ferevellon to make a minion skirmishing him strength -2.

card.name: ·Final Count
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time Legolas wins a skirmish, you may place an {Elven} token on this card. While you can spot X {Elven} tokens on this card and the same number of {Dwarven} tokens on My Axe Is Notched, Legolas is strength +X (limit +3).

card.name: Flashing Steel
card.text: Skirmish: Exert an Elf to make a minion skirmishing that Elf strength -3.

card.name: ·Haldir, Emissary of the Galadhrim
card.text: While no opponent controls a site, Haldir is strength +2. Regroup: Exert Haldir at a battleground and exert another Elf to liberate a site.

card.name: Killing Field
card.text: To play, spot 3 Elves. Plays to your support area. Each wounded minion is prevented from being fierce. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Legolas, Dauntless Hunter
card.text: Archer. The twilight cost of each Shadow event and Shadow condition is +1 for each unbound Hobbit you can spot.

card.name: ·Legolas, Elven Comrade
card.text: Archer. Skirmish: Exert Legolas to make a minion skirmishing an unbound companion strength -1 (or -2 if that companion is Gimli).

card.name: Lembas
card.text: To play, spot 3 Elves. Bearer must be a companion. Regroup: Discard this possession to reconcile your hand.

card.name: Lórien Guardian
card.text: Regroup: Exert this companion to make a Shadow player wound a minion.

card.name: Lórien Is Most Welcome
card.text: To play, spot 3 Elves. Plays to your support area. Each wounded minion loses all damage bonuses. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.

card.name: Lórien Swordsman
card.text: Each minion skirmishing this companion is strength -2 for each wound on that minion.

card.name: Night Without End
card.text: Response: If an Elf wins a skirmish, exert that Elf to liberate a site or wound a minion.

card.name: ·Ordulus, Young Warrior
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. The twilight cost of each ranged weapon played on Ordulus is -1.

card.name: ·Pengedhel, Naith Warrior
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. While Pengedhel bears a ranged weapon, he is strength +2 and he does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.name: ·Strength of Arms
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time an Elf wins a skirmish, you may place an {Elven} token on this card. Skirmish: Make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -1 for each {Elven} token here (limit -3). Discard this condition.

card.name: Supporting Fire
card.text: Skirmish: Make an Elf strength +2 (or +3 if you spot 3 Elf companions).

card.name: Sword-wall
card.text: Skirmish or Regroup: Spot 3 Elf companions to liberate a site or exert a minion.

card.name: ·Thandronen, Veteran Protector
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. Regroup: Exert Thandronen to discard a minion stacked on a condition or stacked on a site.

card.name: ·Thónnas, Naith Captain
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. While Thonnas bears a ranged weapon, each minion skirmishing him is strength -2 and Thonnas does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.name: Valor
card.text: Skirmish: Make an Elf strength +2 (or +3 if skirmishing a wounded minion).

card.name: ·Behold the White Rider
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time Gandalf wins a skirmish, you may place a {Gandalf} token here. Skirmish: Wound a minion skirmishing Gandalf for each {Gandalf} token here. Discard this condition.

card.name: ·Gandalf, Greyhame
card.text: Fellowship: If the twilight pool has fewer than 2 twilight tokens, add {2} to play a character from your discard pile.

card.name: ·Gandalf, The White Wizard
card.text: While you can spot 3 twilight tokens, Gandalf is strength +3.

card.name: ·Gandalf's Staff, Walking Stick
card.text: Bearer must be Gandalf. While you can spot 2 twilight tokens, Gandalf is damage +2.

card.name: Grown Suddenly Tall
card.text: Spell. Fellowship: Spot Gandalf to discard all conditions.

card.name: Have Patience
card.text: Fellowship: Spot Gandalf to heal an unbound companion twice.

card.name: ·Hearken to Me
card.text: Spell. To play, spot Gandalf. Bearer must be Théoden. Discard all Shadow conditions on Théoden. Shadow conditions may not be played on Théoden.

card.name: Into Dark Tunnels
card.text: Spell. Response: If you play a {Gandalf} event, exert Gandalf twice to place that event in your hand instead of your discard pile.

card.name: Keep Your Forked Tongue
card.text: Skirmish: Spot Gandalf and 3 twilight tokens to prevent all wounds to a companion who has the Gandalf signet.

card.name: Long I Fell
card.text: Spell. Skirmish: Spot Gandalf to prevent all wounds to him. Any Shadow player may make you wound a minion to prevent this.

card.name: Mithrandir, Mithrandir!
card.text: Spell. Maneuver: Exert Gandalf to wound each minion who has strength of 6 or less.

card.name: Roll of Thunder
card.text: Fellowship or Maneuver: Spot Gandalf to discard a Shadow possession or Shadow artifact.

card.name: ·Shadowfax
card.text: Bearer must be Gandalf. Discard any hand weapon he bears. Gandalf may not bear a hand weapon. At the start of each skirmish involving Gandalf, each minion skirmishing him must exert.

card.name: Stump and Bramble
card.text: Maneuver: Spot an {Isengard} minion and an Ent ally. Until the regroup phase, that ally is damage +2 and participates in archery fire and skirmishes.

card.name: Task Was Not Done
card.text: Spell. Regroup: Exert Gandalf to discard up to 2 wounded minions.

card.name: ·Treebeard, Earthborn
card.text: Unhasty. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is about to be discarded, stack him here instead. Fellowship: Exert Treebeard and add {1} to play an unbound Hobbit stacked here.

card.name: ·Treebeard, Oldest Living Thing
card.text: Unhasty. Fellowship: Exert Treebeard and discard an unbound companion from hand to heal an unbound companion.

card.name: Under the Living Earth
card.text: Skirmish: Make Gandalf strength +1 for each twilight token you spot (limit +5).

card.name: Well Met Indeed
card.text: Fellowship: Spot an Elf, a {Gondor} Man, and a Dwarf to play Gandalf from your dead pile.

card.name: Windows in a Stone Wall
card.text: To play, exert an Ent. Plays on that Ent. Response: If an {Isengard} minion is killed, discard this condition to reveal the top 10 cards of an opponent's draw deck. Discard 1 Shadow card and 1 Free Peoples card revealed. Your opponent reshuffles tha

card.name: Wizardry Indeed
card.text: Maneuver: If you can spot more minions than companions, exert Gandalf to make an opponent discard a minion.

card.name: ·Aragorn, Heir of Elendil
card.text: Defender +1.

card.name: Arrows Thick in the Air
card.text: Archery or Skirmish: Exert 2 Ring-bound Men to wound each roaming minion.

card.name: ·Boromir, My Brother
card.text: Bearer must be Faramir. Skirmish: Discard a {Gondor} card from hand to make a Ringbound Man strength +1.

card.name: ·Boromir's Gauntlets
card.text: Bearer must be a {Gondor} Man. Skirmish: Exert bearer to cancel a skirmish involving bearer. Any Shadow player may remove {1} to prevent this.

card.name: Curse Them
card.text: Skirmish: Exert a Ring-bound Man to cancel a skirmish involving a roaming minion.

card.name: ·Damrod, Ranger of Ithilien
card.text: Ring-bound. Ranger. To play, spot a Ring-bound Man. Skirmish: Exert Damrod to exhaust a Man he is skirmishing.

card.name: Defend It and Hope
card.text: Maneuver: Exert a {Gondor} Man to wound a minion once (or twice if that minion is an Uruk-hai).

card.name: ·Faramir, Captain of Gondor
card.text: Ring-bound. Ranger. The twilight cost of each other {Gondor} Man in your starting fellowship is -1. While skirmishing a roaming minion, Faramir is strength +2.

card.name: ·Faramir, Son of Denethor
card.text: Ring-bound. Ranger. An opponent may not play skirmish events or use skirmish special abilities during skirmishes involving Faramir.

card.name: ·Faramir's Bow
card.text: Bearer must be Faramir. He is an archer. Skirmish: If Faramir is skirmishing a Man or a roaming minion, exert Faramir to wound that minion.

card.name: ·Faramir's Cloak
card.text: Bearer must be Faramir. Each roaming minion skirmishing a Ring-bound Man is strength -1.

card.name: ·Forbidden Pool
card.text: Plays to your support area. While the fellowship is at site 6{T}, each Ring-bound Man takes no more than 1 wound during each skirmish phase. Fellowship: Add {2} and discard this condition to heal a Ring-bound Man.

card.name: ·Forests of Ithilien
card.text: Plays to your support area. While the fellowship is at site 5{T}, the site number of each Man in a skirmish is +2. Regroup: Discard this condition and exert a Ring-bound Man to liberate a site.

card.name: Gondorian Ranger
card.text: Ring-bound. Ranger. The site number of each minion assigned to skirmish a Ring-bound Man is +2.

card.name: Hard Choice
card.text: Fellowship: Spot Aragorn to heal a companion who has the Aragorn signet twice.

card.name: Help in Doubt and Need
card.text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert an unbound {Gondor} Man to make a {Rohan} companion strength +2, or exert a {Rohan} companion to make an unbound {Gondor} Man strength +2.

card.name: ·Henneth Annûn
card.text: Plays to your support area. While the fellowship is at site 6{T}, each roaming minion skirmishing a Ring-bound companion is strength -2. Skirmish: Spot a {Gondor} Man and discard this condition to wound a roaming minion.

card.name: ·Ithilien Trap
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time a {Gondor} Man wins a skirmish, you may place a {Gondor} token here. Maneuver: Exert a minion for each {Gondor} token here (limit 3). Discard this condition.

card.name: ·Mablung, Soldier of Gondor
card.text: Ring-bound. Ranger. To play, spot a Ring-bound Man. Skirmish: Exert Mablung to exhaust a roaming minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: New Errand
card.text: Skirmish: Spot a Ring-bound Man to make a minion's site number +2. If that minion loses this skirmish, you may wound a minion.

card.name: Pathfinder
card.text: Fellowship or Regroup: Spot a ranger to play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary).

card.name: Ranger of Ithilien
card.text: Ring-bound. Ranger. When this companion is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -1. While skirmishing a roaming minion, this companion is strength +2.

card.name: Ranger's Bow
card.text: Bearer must be Ring-bound Man. Skirmish: If bearer is skirmishing a Man or a roaming minion, exert bearer to wound that minion.

card.name: ·Ranger's Sword, Blade of Aragorn
card.text: Bearer must be Aragorn. While skirmishing an Uruk-hai, Aragorn is strength +2.

card.name: ·Ruins of Osgiliath
card.text: Plays to your support area. While the fellowship is at site 7{T}, each Ring-bound Man is defender +1. Skirmish: Spot a Ringbound Man and discard this condition to wound an opponent's Man.

card.name: Sword of Gondor
card.text: Bearer must be a {Gondor} Man. While skirmishing a Man or a roaming minion, bearer is damage +1.

card.name: War and Valor
card.text: Skirmish: Make a {Gondor} Man strength +2 (or +3 and damage +1 if skirmishing a roaming minion).

card.name: Advance Uruk Patrol
card.text: Damage +1. While at a battleground, this minion is fierce. While you control a battleground, this minion is strength +4.

card.name: Attack on Helm's Deep
card.text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Play an Uruk-hai to place an {Isengard} token on this card. Regroup: Remove 3 {Isengard} tokens from this card and discard an Uruk-hai to take control of a site.

card.name: Band of Uruk Bowmen
card.text: Archer. Damage +1. While you control a site, the minion archery total is +1.

card.name: Banished
card.text: To play, exert Saruman or an {Isengard} Man. Plays on a Free Peoples Man. Each time another ally or companion loses a skirmish, bearer must exert.

card.name: Beyond All Hope
card.text: Maneuver: Exert 2 Uruk-hai to add a burden for each card in the dead pile.

card.name: Beyond Dark Mountains
card.text: Response: If a companion or ally is killed, exert an {Isengard} minion to add a burden (or 2 burdens if Aragorn, Gandalf, or Théoden is killed).

card.name: Broad-bladed Sword
card.text: Bearer must be an Uruk-hai. Bearer may not take wounds (except during skirmish phases).

card.name: Brought Back Alive
card.text: Search. Assignment: Exert an {Isengard} tracker to assign it to an unbound companion. That companion may exert to prevent this (unless that companion is a Hobbit).

card.name: Burning of Westfold
card.text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: If you control a site, play an Uruk-hai to discard a Free Peoples condition.

card.name: Cloud of Arrows
card.text: Archery: Exert an {Isengard} archer to make the minion archery total +1 and the fellowship archery total -1.

card.name: Come Down
card.text: Plays to your support area. Archery: Spot 2 {Isengard} archers to make allies take wounds from archery fire instead of companions.

card.name: Covering Fire
card.text: To play, spot 2 {Isengard} archers. Plays to your support area. The Free Peoples player may not play archery events or use archery special abilities. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Down to the Last Child
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time a companion or ally loses a skirmish involving an Uruk-hai, place an {Isengard} token on this card. Shadow: Remove 2 {Isengard} tokens from this card to take control of a site.

card.name: Driven Back
card.text: Archery: Spot 2 {Isengard} archers to make the minion archery total +1 for each card in the dead pile.

card.name: ·Elite Crossbowmen
card.text: Archer. Damage +1. Archery: Exert Elite Crossbowmen to make the Free Peoples player wound an unbound companion; this minion does not add to the minion archery total.

card.name: Ferocity
card.text: Skirmish: Make an Uruk-hai strength +2 (or +3 if at a battleground).

card.name: Get Back
card.text: Assignment: Prevent an {Isengard} tracker from being assigned to a skirmish by any player.

card.name: ·Gríma, Son of Galmód
card.text: Each unbound companion (or ally) bearing a Shadow condition is strength -1.

card.name: ·Gríma, Wormtongue
card.text: Maneuver: Exert Gríma and spot an unbound companion bearing 3 or more cards to return each Free Peoples card that companion bears to its owner's hand.

card.name: Haunting Her Steps
card.text: Response: If a special ability of an ally or unbound companion is used, exert Gríma to cancel that action.

card.name: Kill Them Now
card.text: Skirmish: Make an {Isengard} tracker strength +2 (or +4 if skirmishing a character bearing a search card).

card.name: Leechcraft
card.text: Spell. To play, exert Saruman or an {Isengard} Man. Plays on a Free Peoples Man. Special abilities in bearer's game text may not be used.

card.name: ·Lieutenant of Orthanc
card.text: Damage +1. Maneuver: Exert Lieutenant of Orthanc to make another Urukhai fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Many Riddles
card.text: Search. To play, exert an {Isengard} tracker. Plays on a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Assignment: Exert an {Isengard} tracker and remove {2} to assign that tracker to bearer. Bearer may exert to prevent this.

card.name: ·Mauhúr, Patrol Leader
card.text: Tracker. Fierce. Skirmish: Remove {2} to prevent an {Isengard} tracker from taking wounds.

card.name: Men Will Fall
card.text: Skirmish: Spot Saruman or an {Isengard} Man to make an unbound companion strength -2.

card.name: New Power Rising
card.text: Regroup: Spot Saruman or an {Isengard} Man, reveal your hand, and discard all Free Peoples cards revealed to take an {Isengard} card into hand from your discard pile.

card.name: No Dawn for Men
card.text: Maneuver: Exert an Uruk-hai to exert X unbound companions, where X is the number of sites you control.

card.name: ·Orthanc Champion
card.text: Damage +1. Assignment: Exert Orthanc Champion to assign it to an unbound companion. That companion may exert to prevent this.

card.name: Orthanc Warrior
card.text: Damage +1.

card.name: ·The Palantír of Orthanc, Seventh Seeingstone
card.text: To play, spot an {Isengard} minion. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Spot an {Isengard} minion and remove {2} to reveal the top card of any draw deck. You may place that card beneath that draw deck.

card.name: Pillage of Rohan
card.text: Plays on a site you control. While an Uruk-hai is stacked on this site, the Free Peoples player may not play skirmish events or use skirmish special abilities.

card.name: Race Across the Mark
card.text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Spot a site you control and remove {2} to cancel a skirmish involving an Uruk-hai.

card.name: ·Ranged Commander
card.text: Archer. The twilight cost of each {Isengard} archer is -1. Archery: Exert Ranged Commander to make the Free Peoples player wound an unbound companion; this minion does not add to the minion archery total.

card.name: ·Ranks Without Number
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns an ally to a skirmish, you may play an {Isengard} minion from your discard pile. That minion's twilight cost is -2.

card.name: Rest While You Can
card.text: Search. To play, spot an {Isengard} tracker. Plays on a companion. Limit 1 per companion. If bearer is killed, reveal the top 10 cards of opponent's draw deck and discard 1 Shadow card and 1 Free Peoples card. Your opponent reshuffles that deck.

card.name: Rohan Is Mine
card.text: To play, spot Saruman or an {Isengard} Man. Plays on a Free Peoples Man. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns bearer to a skirmish, exert each ally.

card.name: ·Saruman, Black Traitor
card.text: Saruman may not take wounds during the archery phase and may not be assigned to a skirmish. When you play Saruman, you may discard a condition. Shadow: Exert Saruman to play Saruman's Staff from your discard pile.

card.name: ·Saruman's Staff, Wizard's Device
card.text: Plays on Saruman. He is fierce and damage +1. Maneuver: Make the first sentence of Saruman's game text not apply until the regroup phase.

card.name: Still They Came
card.text: Skirmish: Exert an Uruk-hai who is not assigned to a skirmish to make another Uruk-hai strength +3.

card.name: ·Uglúk, Servant of Saruman
card.text: Tracker. Fierce. The roaming penalty for each {Isengard} tracker you play is -2. While you can spot 2 {Isengard} trackers, Uglúk is strength +3. While you can spot 3 {Isengard} trackers, Uglúk is damage +1.

card.name: ·Uglúk's Sword
card.text: Bearer must be an Uruk-hai. Shadow: If bearer is Uglúk, exert it and discard a minion from hand to play a minion. Its twilight cost is -3.

card.name: ·Unferth, Gríma's Bodyguard
card.text: Each time the Free Peoples player assigns a companion or ally to an {Isengard} Man, that companion or ally must exert.

card.name: Uruk Assault Band
card.text: Damage +1. To play, spot an Uruk-hai. While at a battleground, this minion is fierce. While you control a battleground, this minion is strength +6. While you control 2 battlegrounds, this minion may not take wounds.

card.name: Uruk Besieger
card.text: Damage +1. Regroup: Stack this minion on a site you control. Shadow: If stacked on a site you control, play this minion. Its twilight cost is -1.

card.name: Uruk Chaser
card.text: Tracker. Fierce. During a fierce skirmish involving this minion, it is strength +2.

card.name: Uruk Crossbow Troop
card.text: Archer. When you play this minion, you may place an {Isengard} token on a machine.

card.name: Uruk Crossbowman
card.text: Archer. Archery: Exert this minion to make the Free Peoples player wound an unbound companion; this minion does not add to the minion archery total.

card.name: Uruk Defender
card.text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Exert this minion at a battleground to make another Uruk-hai strength +2.

card.name: Uruk Fanatic
card.text: Damage +1. If there are at least 3 cards in the dead pile, this minion is fierce.

card.name: Uruk Follower
card.text: Tracker. Fierce. Unbound Hobbits may not be discarded. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is killed, exert this minion to add a burden.

card.name: Uruk Foot Soldier
card.text: Tracker. Fierce. During a fierce skirmish involving this minion, it is strength +3 and damage +1.

card.name: Uruk Hunter
card.text: Tracker. Fierce. Unbound Hobbits may not be discarded. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is killed, exert this minion twice to exhaust a companion.

card.name: Uruk Plains Runner
card.text: Tracker. Fierce. During a fierce skirmish involving this minion, it is strength +3 and damage +1.

card.name: Uruk Pursuer
card.text: Tracker. Fierce. Unbound Hobbits may not be discarded. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is killed, exert this minion to make the Free Peoples player wound an unbound companion.

card.name: Uruk Rear Guard
card.text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Exert this minion at a battleground to make another Uruk-hai strength +1.

card.name: Uruk Regular
card.text: Damage +1. Shadow: Exert this minion to play an Uruk-hai; its twilight cost is -1 for each other Uruk-hai you can spot.

card.name: Uruk Runner
card.text: Tracker. Fierce. During a fierce skirmish involving this minion, it is strength +2.

card.name: Uruk Searcher
card.text: Tracker. Fierce. While skirmishing a character bearing a search card, this minion is strength +2 and damage +1.

card.name: Uruk Seeker
card.text: Tracker. Fierce. While skirmishing a character bearing a search card, this minion is strength +2 and damage +1.

card.name: Uruk Spear
card.text: Bearer must be an Uruk-hai. Maneuver: Exert bearer to discard a Free Peoples mount.

card.name: Uruk Stalker
card.text: Damage +1. While an ally is in the dead pile, this minion is strength +3 and fierce.

card.name: Uruk Stormer
card.text: Damage +1. Each time a companion or ally is killed during a skirmish involving an Uruk-hai, you may take control of a site.

card.name: Uruk Trooper
card.text: Damage +1. Regroup: Stack this minion on a site you control. Shadow: If stacked on a site you control, play this minion. Its twilight cost is -1.

card.name: Uruk Vanguard
card.text: Damage +1 (or damage +2 if at a battleground). To play, spot an Uruk-hai. While at a battleground, this minion is fierce.

card.name: Uruk Veteran
card.text: Damage +1. Regroup: Stack this minion on a site you control. Shadow: If stacked on a site you control, play this minion. Its twilight cost is -1.

card.name: Uruk-hai Band
card.text: Damage +1. This minion is strength +2 for each site you control.

card.name: Uruk-hai Horde
card.text: Damage +1. The twilight cost of this minion is -1 for each site you control.

card.name: Uruk-hai Marauder
card.text: Damage +1. The twilight cost of this minion is -1 for each site you control.

card.name: Uruk-hai Mob
card.text: Damage +1. The twilight cost of this minion is -1 for each site you control.

card.name: Uruk-hai Patrol
card.text: Damage +1 (or damage +2 while you control a site).

card.name: Uruk-hai Raiding Party
card.text: Damage +1.

card.name: Vengeance
card.text: Skirmish: Make an {Isengard} tracker strength +2 for each card borne by the character it is skirmishing.

card.name: Volley Fire
card.text: Archery: Discard 2 {Isengard} archers to exhaust an unbound companion.

card.name: We Are the Fighting Uruk-hai
card.text: Skirmish: Make an Uruk-hai strength +2 (and damage +1 if you control a site).

card.name: Weapons of Isengard
card.text: Machine. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Play an {Isengard} archer to place an {Isengard} token on this card. Archery: Remove 2 {Isengard} tokens from this card to make the minion archery total +2. Discard this condition.

card.name: Weary
card.text: Search. Plays on a companion or ally. Limit 1 per character. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns bearer to skirmish an {Isengard} tracker, bearer must exert.

card.name: What Did You Discover?
card.text: Search. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may discard 2 cards from hand to take an {Isengard} tracker from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Where Has Gríma Stowed It?
card.text: Maneuver: Spot Gríma to discard a possession borne by an ally or unbound companion.

card.name: Wounded
card.text: To play, exert an {Isengard} Man. Plays on a Free Peoples Man. When you play this condition, exert bearer. Wounds may not be removed from bearer.

card.name: ·Arrow From the South
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time a companion or ally loses a skirmish involving a {Raider} Man, you may place a {Raider} token here. Archery: Heal a {Raider} archer for each {Raider} token here. Discard this condition.

card.name: ·Desert Lancers
card.text: Southron. To play, spot a {Raider} Man. Regroup: Exert Desert Lancers twice to take control of a site.

card.name: ·Desert Legion
card.text: Southron. Ambush {1}. While you can spot 4 burdens, this minion is strength +5. While you can spot 5 burdens, this minion is fierce. While you can spot 6 burdens, this minion is damage +1.

card.name: ·Desert Lord
card.text: Southron. Archer. Archery: Exert Desert Lord to exert a companion (except the Ring-bearer); Desert Lord does not add to the minion archery total.

card.name: Desert Soldier
card.text: Southron. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may remove {3} to wound a companion or ally he is skirmishing.

card.name: Desert Spearman
card.text: Southron. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may remove {3} to wound a companion or ally he is skirmishing.

card.name: Desert Warrior
card.text: Southron. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may remove {3} to wound a companion or ally he is skirmishing.

card.name: Discovered
card.text: Maneuver: Exert a {Raider} Man to discard a Free Peoples condition (or 2 Free Peoples conditions if you spot 3 burdens).

card.name: Easterling Axeman
card.text: Easterling. While you can spot 2 burdens, this minion is strength +3 and fierce.

card.name: ·Easterling Captain
card.text: Easterling. Fierce. Skirmish: Spot 2 burdens and remove {2} to make an Easterling strength +2. Skirmish: Spot 4 burdens and remove {2} to make an Easterling strength +3. Skirmish: Spot 6 burdens and remove {2} to make an Easterling strength +4.

card.name: Easterling Guard
card.text: Easterling. Each time this minion is assigned to an unbound companion, you may exert him to add a burden.

card.name: Easterling Infantry
card.text: Easterling. While you can spot 3 burdens, this minion is fierce and damage +1.

card.name: Easterling Lieutenant
card.text: Easterling. Each time this minion is assigned to an unbound companion, you may exert him to add a burden.

card.name: Easterling Skirmisher
card.text: Easterling. When you play this minion, you may spot another Easterling to add {1} for each burden (limit {4}).

card.name: Easterling Trooper
card.text: Easterling. While you can spot 3 burdens, this minion is fierce and damage +1.

card.name: ·Eastern Emyn Muil
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each Ring-bound companion moving from site 2{T} must exert twice. Maneuver: Discard this condition and exert a {Raider} Man to exert a Ringbound companion.

card.name: Elite Archer
card.text: Southron. Archer. Archery: Exert this minion to exert a companion (except the Ring-bearer); this minion does not add to the minion archery total.

card.name: Fearless
card.text: Skirmish: Make a Southron strength +1 for each burden you spot (limit +5), or make a {Raider} Man strength +2.

card.name: Flanking Attack
card.text: Maneuver or Skirmish: Exert a Southron to add {3}.

card.name: Gathering to the Summons
card.text: Skirmish: Spot a {Raider} Man skirmishing a Ring-bound companion to add a burden.

card.name: Howl of Harad
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time a companion or ally loses a skirmish involving a Southron, you may remove {4} to make the Free Peoples Player wound a Ring-bound companion.

card.name: ·Ithilien Wilderness
card.text: Plays to your support area. At the end of each phase during which the fellowship moved to 7{T}, 8{T}, or 9{T} and the twilight pool has fewer than 7 twilight tokens, you may add {8}. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a {Raider} Man strength +2.

card.name: Men of Harad
card.text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Spot a site you control, spot 3 Southrons, and remove {2} to draw a card.

card.name: Men of Rhûn
card.text: Skirmish: Make a {Raider} Man strength +3 (or +4 if you spot 4 burdens).

card.name: New Fear
card.text: Regroup: Exert a {Raider} Man to add a burden for each companion over 4. The Free Peoples player may discard 2 companions (except the Ring-bearer) to prevent this.

card.name: On the March
card.text: Skirmish: Make a {Raider} Man strength +3 (or +5 if you spot 6 companions).

card.name: Raiders From the East
card.text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Remove {3} and exert a {Raider} Man to place a {Raider} token here. Maneuver: Remove a {Raider} token here to add {1}.

card.name: Rapid Fire
card.text: Archery: Exert a {Raider} archer to make the minion archery total +1 for each burden (limit +5).

card.name: ·Regiment of Haradrim
card.text: Southron. To play, spot a {Raider} Man. Regroup: Exert Regiment of Haradrim twice to take control of a site.

card.name: Southron Archer
card.text: Southron. Archer. While you can spot another Southron, the minion archery total is +1 for each site you control.

card.name: Southron Assassin
card.text: Southron. Each time a companion or ally loses a skirmish involving a Southron, you may remove {1} to make the Free Peoples player wound a Ring-bound companion.

card.name: Southron Bow
card.text: Bearer must be a {Raider} Man. Bearer is an archer. While you can spot another {Raider} Man, the minion archery total is +1.

card.name: Southron Bowman
card.text: Southron. Archer. Archery: Exert this minion to exert a companion (except the Ring-bearer); this minion does not add to the minion archery total.

card.name: Southron Commander
card.text: Southron. Ambush {1}. Assignment: Spot 6 companions to assign this minion to the Ring-bearer. The Free Peoples player may discard an unbound companion to prevent this.

card.name: Southron Explorer
card.text: Southron. Regroup: Exert this minion and remove {5} to take control of a site.

card.name: Southron Fighter
card.text: Southron. Ambush {1}. Maneuver: Exert this minion and spot 5 companions to make the Free Peoples player exert a companion.

card.name: Southron Scout
card.text: Southron. Ambush {2}.

card.name: Southron Sentry
card.text: Southron. Maneuver: Exert this minion to add {2} for each site you control.

card.name: Southron Soldier
card.text: Southron. Ambush {2}.

card.name: Southron Spear
card.text: Bearer must be a Southron. Skirmish: Remove {4} and exert bearer to wound a companion or ally bearer is skirmishing.

card.name: Southron Troop
card.text: Southron. Archer. Ambush {1}. To play, spot a Southron. Assignment: Spot 7 companions to assign this minion to the Ringbearer. The Free Peoples player may make you discard a companion (except the Ring-bearer) to prevent this.

card.name: Southron Veterans
card.text: Southron. Ambush {1}. Maneuver: Exert this minion and spot 6 companions to make the Free Peoples player exert 2 companions.

card.name: Southron Wanderer
card.text: Southron. Ambush {1}. Assignment: Exert this minion and spot 5 companions to assign this minion to the Ringbearer. The Free Peoples player may add {4} to prevent this.

card.name: Vision From Afar
card.text: Assignment: Assign an Easterling to the Ring-bearer. The Free Peoples player may add a burden to prevent this.

card.name: Whirling Strike
card.text: Skirmish: Wound a companion or ally skirmishing a {Raider} Man.

card.name: Wrath of Harad
card.text: Plays to your support area. While you can spot a {Raider} Man, each Free Peoples event that spots or exerts a ranger gains this cost: wound a companion. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a {Raider} Man strength +2.

card.name: ·Aldor, Soldier of Edoras
card.text: Archery: Exert Aldor and spot a villager to make the fellowship archery total +1.

card.name: ·Brego
card.text: To play, spot a {Rohan} Man. Bearer must be a Man, Elf, or Wizard. When you play Brego, you may heal bearer. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert.

card.name: ·Ceorl, Weary Horseman
card.text: Response: If your opponent is about to take control of a site, exert Ceorl and a villager to prevent this.

card.name: Elite Rider
card.text: When this companion is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -1. While skirmishing a wounded minion, this companion is strength +2.

card.name: ·Éomer, Sister-son of Théoden
card.text: While you can spot a {Rohan} Man, Éomer's twilight cost is -1. At the start of each turn, you may heal a {Rohan} ally.

card.name: ·Éomer, Third Marshal of Riddermark
card.text: While you can spot a {Rohan} Man, Éomer's twilight cost is -1. Éomer is strength +2 for each wound on each minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: ·Éomer's Spear
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. If bearer is Éomer and he is mounted, Éomer is damage +2.

card.name: ·Éothain, Scout of the Mark
card.text: Each time the fellowship moves to a plains site, each minion must exert.

card.name: ·Éowyn, Lady of Rohan
card.text: Valiant. Response: If an unbound companion is about to take a wound, exert Éowyn and add {1} to prevent that wound.

card.name: ·Éowyn, Sister-daughter of Théoden
card.text: Valiant. Response: If Éowyn is exhausted and about to take a wound in a skirmish, discard 2 cards from hand to prevent that wound.

card.name: ·Éowyn's Sword
card.text: Bearer must be Éowyn. While you can spot a villager, Éowyn is damage +1.

card.name: Fight for the Villagers
card.text: Skirmish: Make a {Rohan} Man strength +2 (or +3 if you spot a villager).

card.name: ·Firefoot
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. If bearer is Éomer, he is defender +1. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert.

card.name: Forth Eorlingas!
card.text: Maneuver: Exert Théoden to make a companion who has the Théoden signet defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Fortress Never Fallen
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time a {Rohan} Man wins a skirmish, you may place a {Rohan} token on this card. Regroup: Discard a Shadow condition for each {Rohan} token here. Discard this condition.

card.name: ·Guma, Plains Farmer
card.text: Villager. Discard Guma if an opponent controls his home site. Fellowship: Exert Guma to heal a {Rohan} Man.

card.name: Heavy Chain
card.text: Bearer must be a Man. Bearer may not be overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.

card.name: Helm! Helm!
card.text: Regroup: Spot 2 mounted {Rohan} Men to liberate a site or draw 3 cards.

card.name: ·Herugrim
card.text: Bearer must be Théoden. He is damage +1.

card.name: ·Hlafwine, Village Farmhand
card.text: Villager. Discard Hlafwine if an opponent controls his home site. Skirmish: Exert Hlafwine to make a {Rohan} Man strength +2.

card.name: An Honorable Charge
card.text: Skirmish: Make an unbound companion strength +1 for each {Rohan} Man you spot (limit +3).

card.name: Horse of Rohan
card.text: To play, spot a {Rohan} Man. Bearer must be a Man, Elf, or Wizard. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert.

card.name: ·King's Mail
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. Bearer takes no more than 1 wound during each skirmish phase. If bearer is Théoden, he may not take wounds except during a skirmish involving him.

card.name: ·Léod, Westfold Herdsman
card.text: Villager. Discard Léod if an opponent controls his home site. Skirmish: Exert Léod to make a mounted companion strength +2.

card.name: Rider of Rohan
card.text: Skirmish: If this companion is mounted, exert him to exert a minion skirmishing an unbound companion.

card.name: Rider's Mount
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert.

card.name: Rider's Spear
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. If bearer is mounted, bearer is damage +1.

card.name: Simbelmynë
card.text: Fellowship: Spot 2 {Rohan} Men (or 1 valiant {Rohan} Man) to play a {Rohan} character or {Rohan} possession from your draw deck.

card.name: Supplies of the Mark
card.text: Plays to your support area. Fellowship: Add {2} and place a villager from hand beneath your draw deck to heal a {Rohan} ally.

card.name: Sword of Rohan
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. While bearer is skirmishing an Uruk-hai, bearer is damage +1.

card.name: ·Théoden, Son of Thengel
card.text: Regroup: Spot a {Rohan} ally and exert Théoden to liberate a site.

card.name: Valleys of the Mark
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time your opponent plays a roaming minion, you may spot a villager to exert that minion.

card.name: Weapon Store
card.text: Plays to your support area. Fellowship: Exert a {Rohan} Man to play a hand weapon from your discard pile.

card.name: ·Weland, Smith of the Riddermark
card.text: Villager. Discard Weland if an opponent controls his home site. Fellowship: Exert Weland to heal a mounted companion.

card.name: Well Stored
card.text: Plays to your support area. At the start of each fellowship phase, you may heal a villager.

card.name: Work for the Sword
card.text: Skirmish: Make a {Rohan} Man strength +2 (and damage +2 if mounted).

card.name: Brace of Coneys
card.text: Bearer must be a Ring-bound Hobbit. Fellowship: Discard this possession to remove a burden.

card.name: ·Cliffs of Emyn Muil
card.text: Plays to your support area. When the fellowship moves from site 1{T}, remove up to 2 burdens. Skirmish: Discard this condition to wound a minion a Hobbit companion is skirmishing.

card.name: Escape
card.text: Stealth. Bearer must be an unbound Hobbit. Limit 1 per character. Skirmish: Exert bearer twice to cancel a skirmish involving him. Any Shadow player may remove {1} to prevent this.

card.name: ·Frodo, Courteous Halfling
card.text: Ring-bearer (resistance 10). While you can spot 3 unbound companions, Shadow cards may not discard cards from your hand or from the top of your draw deck.

card.name: ·Frodo, Tired Traveller
card.text: Ring-bearer (resistance 10). Fellowship: Play a Ring-bound companion to remove a burden.

card.name: ·Frodo's Cloak
card.text: Bearer must be Frodo. Skirmish: At sites 1{T} to 4{T}, add a burden and discard this possession to cancel a skirmish involving Frodo. At any other site, discard this possession to remove a burden and heal Frodo.

card.name: Get On and Get Away
card.text: Fellowship: Add 2 burdens to play the fellowship's next 2 sites (replacing opponent's sites if necessary).

card.name: ·Good Work
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time a Hobbit wins a skirmish, you may place a {Shire} token here. Fellowship: Remove a burden for each {Shire} token here (limit 3). Discard this condition.

card.name: Hobbit Sword
card.text: Bearer must be a Hobbit.

card.name: Impatient and Angry
card.text: Skirmish: Exert Sam to make him strength +3. If Sam wins this skirmish, you may remove a burden.

card.name: Knocked on the Head
card.text: Regroup: Play an unbound Hobbit from your discard pile.

card.name: Light Shining Faintly
card.text: Fellowship: Add a burden to heal a Ring-bound companion twice.

card.name: ·Merry, Learned Guide
card.text: Skirmish: Exert the Ring-bearer to discard Merry. Any Shadow player may remove {2} to prevent this.

card.name: ·Merry, Unquenchable Hobbit
card.text: Skirmish: If Merry is not assigned to a skirmish, discard him to remove a {Sauron} Orc from a skirmish involving an unbound companion.

card.name: Mind Your Own Affairs
card.text: Skirmish: Spot Frodo and add a burden to wound a minion skirmishing a companion who has the Frodo signet.

card.name: ·Pippin, Just a Nuisance
card.text: Skirmish: If Pippin is not assigned to a skirmish, discard him to remove an Urukhai from a skirmish involving an unbound companion.

card.name: ·Pippin, Woolly-footed Rascal
card.text: Skirmish: Add a burden to discard Pippin. Any Shadow player may remove {2} to prevent this.

card.name: ·Sam, Frodo's Gardener
card.text: Ring-bound. Fellowship: Play Sam's Pack from your draw deck. Response: If Frodo is killed, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).

card.name: ·Sam, Samwise the Brave
card.text: Ring-bound. Response: If a Shadow card is about to add any number of burdens, spot Frodo and exert Sam to prevent this. Response: If Frodo is killed, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).

card.name: ·Sam's Pack
card.text: Bearer must be a Ring-bound Hobbit. At the start of each turn, you may add {2} to heal a Ring-bound companion.

card.name: Seven We Had
card.text: Fellowship: Add a burden to discard a condition borne by a Hobbit.

card.name: Severed His Bonds
card.text: Stealth. Skirmish: At sites 1{T} to 4{T}, cancel a skirmish involving a Hobbit. At any other site, prevent a Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.

card.name: Store-room
card.text: Regroup: Heal an unbound Hobbit once (or twice if you spot Gandalf).

card.name: Swiftly and Softly
card.text: Stealth. Skirmish: At sites 1{T} to 5{T}, cancel a skirmish involving a Hobbit. At any other site, prevent a Hobbit from taking more than 1 wound.

card.name: Warmed Up a Bit
card.text: Stealth. Skirmish: Discard an unbound Hobbit.

card.name: East Wall of Rohan
card.text: When the fellowship moves from East Wall of Rohan, add {2}.

card.name: Eastemnet Downs
card.text: Each time you play a companion here, you must discard 2 cards from hand.

card.name: Eastemnet Gullies
card.text: Fellowship: Exert 2 unbound companions to play Legolas from your draw deck.

card.name: Horse-country
card.text: Plains. While you can spot a {Rohan} mount at Horse-country, the move limit is +1 for this turn.

card.name: Plains of Rohan
card.text: Plains. Fellowship: Exert 2 unbound companions to play Gimli from your draw deck.

card.name: The Riddermark
card.text: Plains. Fellowship: Exert 2 unbound companions to play Aragorn from your draw deck.

card.name: Western Emyn Muil
card.text: When the Fellowship moves from Western Emyn Muil, each Ring-bound companion must exert.

card.name: Derndingle
card.text: Forest. While you can spot an unbound Hobbit at Derndingle, the move limit is +1 for this turn.

card.name: Eastfold
card.text: Plains. Shadow: Spot 3 {Isengard} trackers to prevent the fellowship from moving again this turn.

card.name: Fangorn Forest
card.text: Forest. Fellowship: Play Treebeard from your draw deck.

card.name: Plains of Rohan Camp
card.text: Plains. At the start of each fellowship phase, heal up to 3 wounds from companions.

card.name: Rohirrim Village
card.text: Each {Dunland} Man may not take wounds during the archery phase.

card.name: Uruk Camp
card.text: Plains. Battleground. Each time an Uruk-hai is played, that minion must exert.

card.name: Wold of Rohan
card.text: Plains. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns a companion or ally to a skirmish, add {1}.

card.name: Barrows of Edoras
card.text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Place your hand beneath your draw deck and draw 4 cards.

card.name: Golden Hall
card.text: Sanctuary. When the fellowship moves to Golden Hall, all Free Peoples weapons must be discarded.

card.name: Stables
card.text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Exert a {Rohan} Man to play a {Rohan} mount from your draw deck (limit once per turn).

card.name: Streets of Edoras
card.text: Sanctuary. Each {Rohan} ally may not participate in archery fire or skirmishes at Streets of Edoras.

card.name: Throne Room
card.text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Play Th¨¦oden from your draw deck.

card.name: Westemnet Plains
card.text: Plains. Sanctuary. Each {Dunland} Man may not take wounds during the archery phase.

card.name: Ered Nimrais
card.text: Mountain. The twilight cost of each companion and ally played at Ered Nimrais is +3.

card.name: Westemnet Hills
card.text: Plains. When the fellowship moves to Westemnet Hills, heal each mounted companion and mounted ally.

card.name: White Mountains
card.text: Mountain. When the fellowship moves to White Mountains, Th¨¦oden or 2 companions must exert.

card.name: White Rocks
card.text: Battleground. The Shadow number of this site is +1 for each mounted companion.

card.name: Deep of Helm
card.text: Plains. Battleground. The twilight cost of the first Uruk-hai played at Deep of Helm each turn is -3.

card.name: Deeping Wall
card.text: Battleground. Shadow: Play Saruman from your draw deck.

card.name: Helm's Gate
card.text: Battleground. Each companion and minion bearing a hand weapon is strength +2.

card.name: Hornburg Courtyard
card.text: Battleground. While you can spot Aragorn, the Shadow number of Hornburg Courtyard is -2.

card.name: Hornburg Parapet
card.text: Battleground. The fellowship archery total is +1. The minion archery total is -1.

card.name: Caves of Aglarond
card.text: Underground. Sanctuary. Maneuver: Remove {2} to make one of your Uruk-hai fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Great Hall
card.text: Sanctuary. Battleground. Each {Rohan} ally may participate in archery fire and skirmishes at Great Hall.

card.name: Hornburg Armory
card.text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Play a possession to draw a card.

card.name: Cavern Entrance
card.text: Underground. Skirmish events may not be played and skirmish special abilities may not be used.

card.name: Hornburg Causeway
card.text: Battleground. The minion archery total is +2 for each unbound companion over 3.

card.name: King's Room
card.text: When the fellowship moves to King's Room without a {Rohan} companion, each unbound companion must exert.

card.name: Ring of Isengard
card.text: Shadow: Play a {Dunland} minion to draw a card.

card.name: Wizard's Vale
card.text: At the start of the first Shadow phase, if the twilight pool has fewer than 9 twilight tokens, add {4} (limit once per turn).

card.name: Fortress of Orthanc
card.text: Battleground. The Shadow number of Fortress of Orthanc is +2 for each companion over 4.

card.name: Orthanc Balcony
card.text: Battleground. Shadow: Play Saruman from your discard pile; his twilight cost is -2.

card.name: Orthanc Library
card.text: When the fellowship moves to Orthanc Library, each Shadow player may draw a card for each companion over 4.

card.name: Palantír Chamber
card.text: Shadow: Remove 2 burdens to play a minion from your discard pile.

card.name: ·Aragorn, Wingfoot
card.text: Ranger. Each time the fellowship moves, you may wound a minion for each unbound Hobbit you spot.

card.name: ·Théoden, Lord of the Mark
card.text: Fellowship: Play a {Rohan} possession on a {Rohan} companion to heal that companion (limit once per turn).
